item.title: New York Is Losing to Smaller Cities in the Talent Race
item.description: New York City is losing its grip on the talent race. College graduates and more affluent residents are fleeing the high cost of living in the Big Apple, and they’re not just moving to other major cities. A new trend is emerging: people are choosing to move to mid-sized and smaller cities.
